metadata.description: Claude Code skills for tsk-tsk: sandboxed AI agent task delegation

plugins.name: tsk-help
plugins.description: Teaches Claude core tsk commands for delegating tasks to AI agents in sandboxed containers.

plugins.name: tsk-config
plugins.description: Guides users through configuring tsk Docker container images for their project.

plugins.name: tsk-add
plugins.description: Helps queue a development task from the current conversation using tsk add.
